wrapScienceJ.wrapImaJ.wrappers.imagej.gui

Class GuiFrameworkIJ

  • java.lang.Object
    • wrapScienceJ.wrapImaJ.wrappers.imagej.gui.GuiFrameworkIJ
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GuiFramework

    public class GuiFrameworkIJ
extends java.lang.Object
implements GuiFramework
    Main utility to manage Graphical User Interface implemented on the ImageJ Framework Allows to include GUI elements in ImageJ plugins generated through WrapImaJ Follows the Singleton Design Pattern

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void createWindow(ImageCore image, java.lang.String newWindowTilte)
      Duplicates the image and displays the new image in a new window.

      Allows to retrieve the current image (e.g. in the focused image window) as an ImageCore.
      FileHelperIJ getFileHelper()
      Allows to get access to default directories related to the framework

      Allows to retrieve an instance of a Generic Dialog Box to prompt the user for Generic Process Configuration Parameters.

      Allows to retrieve the utility to popup message boxes to the user
